name: Super Crash UFOs
description:
Super Crash UFOs brings a wacky twist to the arcade party games that we all know and love. Collect crates of fish and deliver them to the Drop Zone, throwing them through the portal, in order to gain points. However, don't get to close to your "friends", for they may just wack you and steal the loot for their own. Make use of power-ups to hold your ground or to give yourself a fighting chance to be the one that comes out on top.

Beware what lurks under the surface...

This is a Work In Progress build and is a part of the Mini Jam 91: UFO:

Version Release 1.0 (18/10/2021)

  • Local CO-OP from 2-4 players. 
  • Keyboard and Controller support.
  • Three different Power-Ups.
    • Bamboozled.
    • Black Hole.
    • Shield.
  • Boost ability.
  • Something lurking in the depths...

Keyboard

Movement: Player 1 - W/A/S/D and Player 2 - Arrow Keys

Dash: Player 1 - Left Shift and Player 2 - K

Drop Crate: Player 1 - F and Player 2 - J

Controller

Movement: Left Analog Stick

Drop Crate: A

Dash: Y

This is a 72 hour games jam made by a team of 5 people, working remotely from 3 different countries. Everything included in the game was made within the Jam deadline (no premade assets).
